io.micronaut.core.async.annotation

Annotation Type SingleResult


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value={METHOD,ANNOTATION_TYPE})
public @interface SingleResult
    Annotation that can be used to describe that an API emits a single result even if the return type is a Publisher.
    Since:
    1.0.2
    Author:
    graemerocher

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Fields and Description
      static java.lang.String NAME
      The class name.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean value
      Whether the result is a single result.

    • Field Detail

      • NAME

        public static final java.lang.String NAME
        The class name.

    • Element Detail

      • value

        public abstract boolean value
        Whether the result is a single result.
        Returns:
        True if it is.
        Default:
        true
